attributes.review: the app told me that coronavirus is a hoax and that it’s all the dems plan to try and get us to go blue next year. i showed my grandpas ashes this and let me just say he was not amused. he said that trump better pay his medical bills personally cause corona isn’t cheap. overall grandpa does not approve.

attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
attributes.review: This app asks for the US  debt total (almost 27 trillion dollars) for in app purchases. Every 5th time I open this app it crashes. A jingle proclaiming Trump’s massive hands plays every time I tap a different interface and forces the volume to max. And every time I leave the app a banner pops up saying a system designed to model slavery is worth protecting and honoring even as it causes the deaths of numerous black people, it’s worded something like “blue lives matter.” If it was possible to give this app 0 stars I would absolutely trash, would go excellently with my trump toilet cleaner

attributes.title: Worst App ever
attributes.review: Dear friends I downloaded this app thinking I would be a better citizen and help the best president in history. But when downloading this app I got various viruses and many in Russian so I deleted it.
